## Session.getItem() method

Returns the value of the specified item in the specified storage.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getItem(key: string | UserInfoKeys, storage: StorageType): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string \| UserInfoKeys | The key to get. |
|  storage | [StorageType](./foundation-comms.storagetype.md) | The storage type to use. |

**Returns:**

string

- The value of the specified item.
